acf.content:
QL Resources and Ngurrara Pvt Ltd, provided operational planning, management  and technical services which resulted in safe and compliant design execution at the Gudai Darri Expansion Project.

Bulk Earthworks and Final works included construction of:

  • Permanent Haul Roads.
  • Infrastructure Pads.
  • Access Roads.
  • Water channels and Culvert Installation.

Together with Ngurrara Pvt Ltd, QL Resources paves the way for a robust road network and other civil works that facilitates the growth and success of Rio Tinto’s Gudai Darri iron ore mine while upholding the highest standards of Safety and ESG stewardship.
acf.title: Collaboration of QL Resources and Ngurrara for the Construction of Permanent Road and infrastructure at Gudai Darri Iron ore Mines Rio Tinto
